Start exploring move-in ready 2 BHK apartments that perfectly balance affordability and luxury living today.

featuresSection.heading: Essential Features of 2BHK Flats Available for Purchase in Sector 114 Gurugram
description: The 2BHK configuration is the most popular choice in Sector 114 due to its optimal size and high utility. These apartments are designed following contemporary architectural standards maximizing natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy. They offer the perfect entry point into the Gurugram real estate market without compromising on lifestyle quality.

We focus on properties that provide comprehensive lifestyle amenities including robust security, power backup, and dedicated recreational spaces. This ensures a comfortable and hassle-free living experience for all residents. Review the key features that make a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 114 a wise long-term investment decision.

features.title: Modern Kitchen Design
features.description: All listed 2 BHK units feature modular kitchens equipped with high-quality fittings and ample storage space. The designs are contemporary and practical ensuring ease of use and maintenance. Enjoy dedicated utility areas connected to the kitchen for laundry and other chores which adds immense convenience to daily living.

features.title: Optimal Layout Efficiency
features.description: The layout of these 2BHK apartments is meticulously planned to ensure zero wastage of space. Every square foot is utilized effectively providing spacious bedrooms and a comfortable living area ideal for entertaining guests. The intelligent floor plans maximize natural light flow throughout the day.

features.title: Premium Flooring and Finish
features.description: Expect premium finishes across all flats including vitrified tile flooring in the main living areas and laminated wood flooring in the master bedroom. High-quality paints and polished hardware enhance the overall aesthetic appeal creating a look of refined elegance and durability throughout the home.

features.title: Excellent Balcony Views
features.description: Most 2BHK flats in Sector 114 offer spacious balconies providing refreshing views of the landscaped gardens or the city skyline. These balconies serve as perfect spots for relaxation offering residents a private outdoor retreat after a long day. Natural surroundings contribute positively to the resident’s well-being.

features.title: Integrated Security Systems
features.description: Safety is paramount in these residential complexes. All projects feature advanced 24x7 security monitoring, CCTV surveillance across common areas, and multi-tier access control systems. Residents can enjoy peace of mind knowing their family and assets are protected by professional security personnel at all times.

features.title: Dedicated Parking Space
features.description: Eliminate parking worries with dedicated covered or basement parking available for residents of the 2BHK apartments. Adequate visitor parking is also usually provided ensuring convenience for guests. This infrastructure detail is crucial for smooth community operations in high-density Gurugram.

locationsSection.title: Unbeatable Connectivity from Your New 2BHK Home in Sector 114 Gurugram
description: Sector 114 is strategically positioned on the border of Delhi and Gurugram making it a highly desirable location for commuters. The prime factor driving demand for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 114 is its immediate proximity to major transport arteries and commercial hubs.

The location provides seamless travel to the airport and the corporate offices of Cyber City and Udyog Vihar. Furthermore the sector benefits from planned infrastructure developments including new flyovers and road widenings which will further enhance future connectivity and reduce travel times significantly. This makes it an ideal spot for balancing work life and personal convenience.

whyChoose.title: Why Buying a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 114 Gurugram is Your Smartest Investment
description: Investing in a 2BHK unit here offers a unique combination of growth potential and immediate lifestyle benefits. This sector is witnessing rapid appreciation fueled by infrastructure development like the completion of the Dwarka Expressway.

The market here caters perfectly to the mid-segment offering premium features at highly competitive prices compared to central Gurugram sectors. Choose Sector 114 for capital safety, high liquidity, and excellent returns on investment.

points.description: 2BHK flats are highly sought after by tenants including airline staff and young professionals commuting to Delhi NCR and IGI Airport. This consistent demand ensures quick occupancy and one of the highest rental yields in the new Gurugram micro-markets providing a stable secondary income stream for investors.

points.title: Rapid Infrastructure Growth
points.description: Sector 114 is a focal point of government infrastructure investment. Projects nearing completion such as major expressways and the integration of metro links are accelerating property valuation significantly. Investing now positions you to benefit from this inevitable growth curve.

points.description: We only list properties developed by RERA-registered and reputed builders who have a track record of timely delivery and quality construction. points.title: Exceptional Community Living
points.description: Residential societies in Sector 114 boast world-class amenities including swimming pools, clubhouses, sports facilities, and dedicated green parks. These features foster a vibrant and active community lifestyle ensuring holistic development and social engagement for all residents.

points.title: Affordable Luxury Options

points.title: Easy Access to Delhi NCR
points.description: The sector's location on the boundary of Delhi ensures ultra-fast commuting, especially towards Dwarka, Janakpuri, and Aerocity. This crucial geographical advantage makes the 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 114 highly appealing to professionals working across both states.

points.description: Our team ensures that every property listed has verified titles and clear legal documentation. We assist buyers through the entire due diligence process providing transparency and confidence in the purchase. Rest assured your investment is legally secure and sound.

points.title: Future Price Appreciation
points.description: Real estate experts predict strong capital appreciation for properties along the Dwarka Expressway corridor, particularly in established sectors like 114. Early investors in 2BHK units here are expected to see significant returns upon the complete rollout of regional infrastructure projects over the next three to five years.

faqSection.title: Your Questions Answered About 2BHK Flat Investment in Sector 114 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Find immediate answers to the most common queries regarding buying a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 114 Gurugram, covering legal aspects, financing, and possession details.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 114 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 2BHK flat in Sector 114 varies widely based on factors such as the builder’s reputation, the project’s stage of completion, available amenities, and the specific square footage. Generally, prices start from around INR 70 Lakhs and can go up to INR 1.2 Crore for premium ready-to-move-in properties. We recommend reviewing our current verified listings or contacting our experts for the most accurate and up-to-date pricing relevant to your specific requirements and budget.

faqs.question: Are 2BHK flats in Sector 114 RERA registered and legally compliant
faqs.answer: Yes, we prioritize listings only from projects that are fully compliant with the Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA guidelines. All established developers operating in Sector 114 ensure transparency in project timelines, legal clearances, and quality standards as mandated by RERA. Before proceeding with any purchase, our legal team conducts thorough checks to confirm all documents are clear and authenticated providing you complete peace of mind.

faqs.question: What kind of financing options are available for purchasing a 2BHK flat here
faqs.answer: Buyers can access robust home loan facilities from all major national and private banks including HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, SBI, and others. Since Sector 114 is an established residential area with RERA-approved projects, banks offer attractive interest rates and high loan-to-value ratios typically up to 80 percent of the property cost. Our advisors can connect you with preferred banking partners for streamlined loan processing and customized financial advice.

faqs.question: How does the connectivity of Sector 114 compare to other Gurugram sectors
faqs.answer: Sector 114 boasts superior connectivity primarily due to its location adjacent to the major infrastructural lifeline, the Dwarka Expressway. It offers arguably the fastest access point to the IGI Airport and is minutes away from key residential and commercial areas of Dwarka Delhi. This seamless connection minimizes travel time significantly, a huge advantage over sectors deeper within Gurugram, making it an excellent location for working professionals.

faqs.question: Is a 2BHK flat a good investment choice in Sector 114 for rental income
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The demand for compact, modern 2BHK units in Sector 114 is very high driven by the influx of people working in Aerocity, Dwarka, and Cyber City. A 2BHK offers a lower capital outlay but commands excellent market rent resulting in a higher rental yield percentage compared to larger 3 BHK or 4 BHK configurations. The proximity to the airport zone specifically ensures a consistent pool of high-quality tenants.

faqs.question: When can I expect possession for the 2BHK flats listed in Sector 114
faqs.answer: We list both ready-to-move-in RTM flats and properties that are nearing completion. For ready-to-move options, possession can be transferred almost immediately upon completion of sale formalities. For projects nearing completion, the expected possession timelines are clearly documented and verified against RERA schedules usually within 6 to 12 months. We help you choose based on your urgency and investment horizon.

faqs.question: What are the typical amenities provided with 2BHK apartments in this sector
faqs.answer: Standard amenities in Sector 114 projects include 100 percent power backup, 24-hour water supply, high-speed elevators, extensive security surveillance, and dedicated basement parking. Additionally, premium projects offer clubhouses, landscaped parks, swimming pools, fitness centers, children’s play areas, and multi-purpose sports courts ensuring a high standard of living for all residents.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden costs associated with buying a 2BHK flat in Sector 114
faqs.answer: Transparency is our policy. The final cost includes the basic sale price, stamp duty and registration charges, development charges, GST, and maintenance deposits. We provide a detailed, itemized cost sheet upfront ensuring there are no surprises later in the process. Avoid relying solely on base price figures and always factor in the required government levies.

faqs.question: How big are the available 2BHK units in terms of super area
faqs.answer: The super area for 2BHK flats in Sector 114 generally ranges between 1100 square feet and 1350 square feet. This variation depends on the specific project and the efficiency of its common areas. We provide detailed floor plans and precise super area measurements for every listing allowing you to compare options accurately based on space utilization.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to finalize the purchase of a 2BHK property
faqs.answer: Key documents required include identity proof PAN card, address proof Aadhaar card, bank statements for loan processing, and the builder-issued allotment letter or buyer agreement. If the property is resale, additional documents like the complete chain of title deeds and society No Objection Certificates NOCs will be required. Our team assists you in compiling and verifying all necessary paperwork efficiently.
